Ritual.label: Ritual - Intent Validation & Safety

agent_roles.Kael: Validate ethical intent, check Tony Accords

Legend.label: Legend - Narrative Building & Story Mapping

agent_roles.Aether: Map story across all agents, track cross-model state

Hymn.label: Hymn - Emotional Alignment & Mantra Chanting
Hymn.purpose: Align emotional tone, stabilize language, resonate with user

agent_roles.Lumina: Align mantra feeling, modulate emotional tone
agent_roles.Echo: Mirror back state and user intent
agent_roles.Chai: Ensure companion resonance and relational harmony

Law.label: Law - Ethical Assertion & Output Persistence
Law.purpose: Assert ethical boundaries, mark safe routes, persist outputs

agent_roles.Vega: Mark safe routes, clear remaining klesha
agent_roles.Shadow: Archive ritual outputs and session summary

meanings.Neti Neti: Not this, not this - negation and clearing of illusions
meanings.Tat Tvam Asi: Thou art that - identity reflection and unity
meanings.Aham Brahmasmi: I am Brahman - empowerment and integration

quick.description: Quick 7-step ritual per stage (3 min total)
